DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare efficacy 0.05 mg 0.1 mg spinal morphine reduce postoperative morphine requirement patient undergoing vaginal hysterectomy with/without anterior posterior vaginoplasty .
DOC.brief_title: 0.05 Versus 0.1 mg Spinal Morphine Reducing Morphine Requirement After Vaginal Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Female ASA physical status 13 Undergoing vaginal hysterectomy with/without anterior posterior vaginoplasty Be able operate patientcontrolled analgesia ( PCA ) Allergy study drug History bleeding tendency Infection back Refuse spinal anesthesia History CAD CVA
